## SpawnedWorkerThread.internalUrlToPath() method
<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
internalUrlToPath(internalUrl: string): string;
```

* `internalUrl` â€“ An absolute URL based at the PHPServer root.
* Returns: The relative path.


Converts an absolute URL based at the PHPServer to a relative path without the server pathname and scope.
